total_account_count.description: Total number of accounts under the product.

delinquent_account_count.description: Total number of delinquent accounts under the product

total_credit_issued.description: Total amount (in cents) of credit issued to accounts under the product.

utilization.description: The percent utilization rate of the product. (i.e. 30 means 30% utilization).

product_id.description: The Canopy-generated ID for the product.

effective_as_of_date.description: The `Date-Time` you would like the system to return the data as of. IE tell me what the product information was as if I had asked on `2020-10-20 00:00:00 EST`. If empty it defaults to current time.
